title: Vontive
description: Vontive builds technology that is transforming real-estate investment finance, a $2 trillion market. We provide liquidity to homebuilders, investors buying and renovation properties, and landlords. Our mortgages close 80% faster than bank loans and offer the same competitive pricing. The company was founded in 2017 by Freddie Mac and Palantir Technologies alumni and is backed by prominent venture capital firms.
